name: Moonlit (XCROWE)
description:
A story focused around a Moon Jellyfish who has lost their memories. Uncover their past and learn about the divide between the Moon's regions and of the secrets that haunt the Moon.

  BUILD VERSION - 0.1  

(Intro Chapter for the "I Can't Write but Want to Tell a Story" Game Jam, relatively unpolished build) 

FEATURES

(As of Build 0.1)

  • Approx. 10 minutes per route
  • Two routes
  • Everyone's an aquatic creature!

 CREDITS 

  • Built in Ren'py
  • Art, Music, Writing, Code, and SFX - Synia Khunprachansri (XCROWE)
  • Inspired by Hollow Knight's world-building
  • Wind SFX - Magnus Chirgwin

  NOTES 

[8/6] This is my first solo-developed game, so I hope you like at least a little bit of it! Depending on the reception for the project, I may finish and refine it the whole way through, since I have the entire story planned out to the end. Not too sure, though, but definitely willing to give it a shot. (I also... didn't realize I should clear out the save files so don't mind that they're there, if they are? l
